# Appendix C: Qualtrics Survey and Results Summary

This appendix contains the actual Qualtrics survey that was sent to each of the MIDS alumni, as well as a graphical summary of the completed survey responses.  Figure \@ref(fig:qualtrics) is the screenshot of the Qualtrics survey that was sent to each of the MIDS alumni.  Figure \@ref(fig:results-p1) and Figure \@ref(fig:results-p2) are summary visualizations of the 229 responses we received from the MIDS alumni.

```{r qualtrics, echo=FALSE, fig.align = "center", out.height = "74%", fig.cap = "Screenshot of Qualtrics survey"}
knitr::include_graphics(here::here("report/images", "Qualtrics_Survey.png"))
```

```{r results-p1, echo=FALSE, fig.align = "center", out.width = "100%", fig.cap = "Summary of responses to the first set of statements from the Qualtrics survey"}
knitr::include_graphics(here::here("report/images", "survey_results_p1.png"))
```

```{r results-p2, echo=FALSE, fig.align = "center", out.width = "100%", fig.cap = "Summary of responses to the last question from the Qualtrics survey"}
knitr::include_graphics(here::here("report/images", "survey_results_p2.png"))
```
